statements: SELECT * FROM EnergyConsumption;
SELECT location, energy_consumed, timestamp FROM EnergyConsumption;
SELECT * FROM EnergyConsumption ORDER BY timestamp DESC;
SELECT location FROM EnergyConsumption WHERE energy_consumed > 100;
SELECT timestamp, energy_consumed FROM EnergyConsumption WHERE location = 'New York';
SELECT * FROM EnergyConsumption WHERE location='Office' ORDER BY timestamp DESC LIMIT 10;
SELECT location, SUM(energy_consumed) AS total_energy FROM EnergyConsumption GROUP BY location HAVING total_energy > 100;
SELECT * FROM EnergyConsumption WHERE timestamp BETWEEN '2021-01-01' AND '2021-12-31' ORDER BY timestamp;
SELECT DISTINCT location FROM EnergyConsumption ORDER BY location ASC;
SELECT timestamp, energy_consumed FROM EnergyConsumption WHERE energy_consumed > 50 ORDER BY energy_consumed DESC, timestamp ASC LIMIT 5;
SELECT * FROM EnergyConsumptionData;
SELECT id, energy_usage, timestamp FROM EnergyConsumptionData ORDER BY timestamp DESC;
SELECT id, forecasted_energy FROM ForecastedEnergyNeeds WHERE forecasted_energy > 100;
SELECT timestamp, energy_usage FROM EnergyConsumptionData WHERE energy_usage < 50 ORDER BY timestamp ASC;
SELECT id, timestamp, forecasted_energy FROM ForecastedEnergyNeeds WHERE forecasted_energy < 200 ORDER BY forecasted_energy DESC;
SELECT * FROM EnergyConsumptionData WHERE energy_usage > 100 ORDER BY timestamp DESC LIMIT 10;
SELECT id, timestamp, energy_usage FROM EnergyConsumptionData WHERE timestamp BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-01-31' ORDER BY energy_usage DESC;
SELECT forecasted_energy, timestamp FROM ForecastedEnergyNeeds WHERE timestamp >= '2022-02-01' AND forecasted_energy < 500 ORDER BY timestamp ASC;
SELECT id, timestamp, energy_usage FROM EnergyConsumptionData WHERE energy_usage < 50 OR timestamp < '2022-03-01' LIMIT 5 OFFSET 2;
SELECT * FROM EnergyConsumptionData e JOIN ForecastedEnergyNeeds f ON e.timestamp = f.timestamp WHERE e.energy_usage > f.forecasted_energy ORDER BY e.timestamp ASC;
SELECT * FROM EnergyConsumption WHERE location = 'New York';
SELECT id, timestamp, energy_usage FROM EnergyForecast ORDER BY forecast_date DESC;
SELECT provider_name, provider_location FROM EnergyProviders WHERE id = 1;
SELECT MAX(energy_usage) AS max_energy_usage FROM EnergyConsumption;
SELECT * FROM EnergyForecast WHERE forecasted_usage > 100 ORDER BY timestamp ASC;
SELECT * FROM EnergyConsumption WHERE energy_usage > 100 ORDER BY timestamp DESC;
SELECT location, SUM(energy_usage) AS total_energy_usage FROM EnergyConsumption GROUP BY location;
SELECT forecast_date, forecasted_usage FROM EnergyForecast WHERE forecast_date >= '2022-01-01' ORDER BY forecasted_usage DESC;
SELECT * FROM EnergyProviders WHERE provider_location = 'California' ORDER BY provider_name;
SELECT MAX(energy_usage) AS max_energy_usage, MIN(energy_usage) AS min_energy_usage FROM EnergyConsumption;
SELECT * FROM energy_consumption_data;
SELECT id, timestamp, energy_usage FROM energy_consumption_data WHERE location='New York';
SELECT provider_name, location, contact_info FROM energy_providers ORDER BY location DESC;
SELECT source_name, energy_type, capacity FROM energy_sources WHERE capacity > 1000;
SELECT cost_id, electricity_cost, gas_cost, delivery_cost, taxes_cost FROM energy_costs;
SELECT * FROM energy_consumption_data ORDER BY timestamp DESC LIMIT 10;
SELECT id, energy_usage, location FROM energy_consumption_data WHERE energy_usage > 100 ORDER BY energy_usage ASC;

SELECT ec.location, ep.provider_name, ec.energy_usage, ec.timestamp FROM energy_consumption_data ec JOIN energy_providers ep ON ec.location = ep.location WHERE ec.energy_usage > 200 ORDER BY ec.timestamp DESC;

SELECT ec.location, es.energy_type, es.capacity, ec.forecasted_energy_need FROM energy_consumption_data ec JOIN energy_sources es ON ec.location = es.source_name WHERE ec.forecasted_energy_need BETWEEN 500 AND 1000;

SELECT ep.provider_name, ec.location, ec.timestamp, SUM(ec.energy_usage) AS total_energy_usage FROM energy_consumption_data ec JOIN energy_providers ep ON ec.location = ep.location GROUP BY ep.provider_name, ec.location, ec.timestamp ORDER BY total_energy_usage DESC, ec.timestamp ASC;
SELECT * FROM EnergyConsumptionData;
SELECT Date, Time, EnergyConsumed FROM EnergyConsumptionData WHERE Time BETWEEN '09:00:00' AND '17:00:00';
SELECT BuildingName, Address FROM BuildingInfo WHERE BuildingID = 'B123';
SELECT * FROM EnergyPredictions ORDER BY Date DESC, Time ASC;
SELECT ProviderName, ContactInfo FROM EnergyProviders WHERE EstimatedCostPerUnit < 0.1;
SELECT * FROM EnergyConsumptionData
SELECT Date, Time, EnergyConsumed FROM EnergyConsumptionData ORDER BY Date DESC, Time ASC
SELECT BuildingName, Address FROM BuildingInfo WHERE ConstructionDate > '2020-01-01'
SELECT Date, EnergyForecast FROM EnergyPredictions WHERE Time BETWEEN '08:00:00' AND '18:00:00'
SELECT ProviderName, EstimatedCostPerUnit FROM EnergyProviders ORDER BY EstimatedCostPerUnit
